# Support

## Getting Help

We're here to help! Here are the best ways to get support for forge-js:

### üìö Documentation

- **Main README**: [README.md](../README.md) - Overview and quick start
- **Contributing Guide**: [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md) - How to contribute
- **Package Documentation**: See individual package READMEs in `packages/*/README.md`
- **AI Agent Guides**: See `packages/*/AGENTS.md` for LLM-optimized documentation

### üêõ Bug Reports

Found a bug? Please open an issue using our [bug report template](.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug_report.md).

**Before reporting:**
- Search existing issues to avoid duplicates
- Check the documentation
- Provide a minimal reproduction case
- Include environment details (Node.js, package versions, OS)

### ‚ú® Feature Requests

Have an idea? We'd love to hear it! Use our [feature request template](.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/feature_request.md).

### üí¨ Discussions

For questions, ideas, or general discussion:
- [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/ofri-peretz/forge-js/discussions)

### üìß Direct Contact

- **GitHub Issues**: [Open an issue](https://github.com/ofri-peretz/forge-js/issues/new)
- **Email**: ofriperetzdev@gmail.com

## Response Times

- **Critical bugs**: Within 24-48 hours
- **Feature requests**: Reviewed weekly
- **General questions**: Best effort, typically within a week

## Community Guidelines

- Be respectful and constructive
- Provide context when asking questions
- Search existing issues/discussions before posting
- Follow our [Code of Conduct](../CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md)

## Contributing

We welcome contributions! See our [Contributing Guide](../CONTRIBUTING.md) for details.

## Resources

- **NPM Packages**: [@forge-js on npm](https://www.npmjs.com/search?q=%40forge-js)
- **GitHub Repository**: [github.com/ofri-peretz/forge-js](https://github.com/ofri-peretz/forge-js)
- **Documentation**: [docs/](../docs/) directory
